text:
I know you can add custom fields to the blog template. But is it possible to specifically add a `datetime` picker as one of the fields?
My client is using Events as a blog and I need to be able to pull that data into the listing.

For example, I can add a Location field to the blog like this:
`{% text "location" label='Location', export_to_template_context=True %}`

Is there no way to add a `{% datetime export_to_template_context=True %}` ??
You can include a custom module on the blog post level.
